guide.title: Consultants
guide.abstract: Referral list for Gentoo support consultants

body.p: As a service to the Gentoo community and to advance the use of Gentoo in the corporate sector the Gentoo Trustees Maintain a referral page for your convenience. The companies and individual consultants are not officially endorsed by the Gentoo Foundation.

Gentoo is free software and offers free help through our great Gentoo community. Some people either don't have the time or have specialized needs and are willing to hire someone to either maintain or add additional functionality to their Gentoo system. The following is a list of people and companies who make at least part of their income from doing paid support for Gentoo.

Please note that some consultants donate a portion of their income (derived from Gentoo) to supporting Gentoo. This is up to each consultant or company. Of course, this is pointed out to you so that it will hopefully influence your choice ...
